title: Missing RP
body: I spent $10 on rp and it's not showing up. Usually it is instant, but i logged out and back in and it's still not there. My account has been charged as well and I don't seem mah rp!

replies.body: it's okay now. just took 10 minutes. thank you
I looked into this for you, and everything looks okay to me.  You may need to relog just in case to show your updated balance.  Let me know if this is still an issue!
